98777036$Tragoedia$$DARK$[Fiend/effect]$$$$$10$0$0$$$$When you take battle damage: You can Special Summon this card from your hand. Gains 600 ATK/DEF for each card in your hand. Once per turn: You can send 1 monster from your hand to the GY
